description.value:
Master-Crafted Relic Auspex of the Deathwatch. Works as regular Auspex but has +30 to Awareness Tests to detect Daemons and only +5 against other adversaries. Can also provide cryptic clues or hints of impending Daemonic Activity.

Requirements

Officially belongs to the Grey Knights, they think it lost, and would be annoyed to find the Deathwatch have it.

Effect: Hero

Notes: 20 R
